education.subject: SSC in Business Studies
education.desc: Successfully completed under the Chittagong Education Board, with a strong foundation in accounting, finance, business principles, and practical decision-making skills.

education.subject: HSC in Business Studies
education.desc: Completed under the Chittagong Education Board, with strong academic focus on business management, accounting, finance, and analytical skills essential for higher education and future career development.

certifications.subject: React JS (Basic) Certification
certifications.desc: Earned my first React JS certification from HackerRank as part of my learning journey in web development. This basic certification helped me understand the fundamentals of React, including components, props, state management, and building simple interactive applications. It's a starting point as I continue to learn and improve my skills in modern front-end development.

certifications.subject: Python (Basic) Certificateion
certifications.desc: Completed the Python (Basic) certification from HackerRank as part of my programming learning journey. This certification covered fundamental Python concepts including data types, control structures, functions, and basic problem-solving techniques. It's a foundational step as I continue to build my skills in Python programming and explore its applications in development.
